content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am open to negotiating the rental price, but I do want to emphasize that I am a landlord and I want to maximize my gains. Please let me know what rental price you have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. What is your starting price for the apartment?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: My starting price for the apartment is 1500 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and adjusting the price based on the specific needs and circumstances of the tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I see. Based on the size of the apartment, I would propose a rental price of 1300 Euros per month. Is this something you can agree to?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand your proposal, Juan. While I am willing to negotiate, I am still looking to maximize my gains as a landlord. I would counter your proposal with a rental price of 1400 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
